hero-description: There are many ways to get involved with MapSwipe.
contribute-now-description: MapSwipe offers many ways to engage and contribute to our community!
looking-to-make-impact: Are you looking to make an impact?
looking-to-make-impact-description: Download our MapSwipe app and help complete missions.
possess-techincal-skills-description: Volunteer to support app development and contribute your expertise in improving the MapSwipe app.
possess-language-skills: Do you possess language translation skills?
possess-language-skills-description: Volunteer to help make the app & website available in more languages.
want-to-host-mapswipe-events: Are you a community, academic, or non-profit group wanting to host MapSwipe events?
want-to-host-mapswipe-events-description: Download our MapSwipe Event Toolkit and start bringing people together by mapping projects.
engage-your-csr: Engage your CSR and employees. Make an impact now!
engage-your-csr-description: Register your event details and our team will follow up to explore options for support.
humanitarian-or-nonprofit: Are you a humanitarian or nonprofit organization seeking to enhance your geospatial data capabilities?
humanitarian-or-nonprofit-description: Share your interest with us and our team will follow up to determine the right solution.
interested-in-supporting: Interested in supporting MapSwipe with a donation?
interested-in-supporting-description: Your donation will help ensure smooth operation, sustainability and maintenance of the app. Download the latest financial summary report.
contact-section-description: Get in touch with us! Share feedback, explore project types, or dive into MapSwipe analytics. We're here to assist you!
